message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on its value of $12000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $10000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price that is still significantly higher than its cost to me. I look forward to your positive response.
